message.content: You are going to redesign this website (https://matrimony.globalnadars.com) with this designing (https://sportsbookbandits.com). I want all the functionality in the first website to remain, except change the text to english. Remeber to use the styling from the second website, especially the gradient usage. Make the log in / registration page too. Although it won't do anything for now I'll give you the firebase link to make it work later on. Also, I'll you can see what are the questions that are asked in the registration process to the matrimony website later after I give you the firebase link.

content.text: I'll help you redesign the matrimony website with the styling from the sportsbook website while maintaining all functionality. Let me start by examining both websites to understand their structure and styling.

todos.content: Fetch and analyze the matrimony website structure and functionality
Fetch and analyze the sportsbook website styling (especially gradients)
todos.activeForm: Fetching and analyzing sportsbook website styling

todos.content: Set up project structure with React/Next.js or appropriate framework
Create main layout with sportsbook-inspired styling
Implement all pages from matrimony website with English text
Create login/registration page with sportsbook styling
Apply gradient styling throughout the application
Prepare Firebase integration structure for later

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

input.prompt: Analyze this matrimony website. Extract: 1) All pages and navigation structure, 2) All features and functionality (search, filters, profiles, etc.), 3) Content structure and text elements (translate if not in English), 4) Forms and input fields, 5) Overall layout and component structure

Analyze this sportsbook website's design and styling. Extract: 1) All gradient styles used (colors, directions, locations), 2) Color scheme and palette, 3) Typography styles, 4) Button and UI component styles, 5) Layout patterns, 6) Header/footer design, 7) Any animations or transitions
